TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebCache extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a cache to store frequently accessed data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Get(string key) cil managed
Public Shared Function Get (key As String) As Object

Docs.param: The identifier for the cache item to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the specified item from the object.
Docs.returns: The item retrieved from the cache, or null if the item is not found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Remove(string key) cil managed
Public Shared Function Remove (key As String) As Object

Docs.param: The identifier for the cache item to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified item from the object.
Docs.returns: The item removed from the object. If the item is not found, returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Set (string key, object value, int minutesToCache = 20, bool slidingExpiration = true);
.method public static hidebysig void Set(string key, object value, int32 minutesToCache, bool slidingExpiration) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Set (key As String, value As Object, Optional minutesToCache As Integer = 20, Optional slidingExpiration As Boolean = true)
static member Set : string * obj * int * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The identifier for the cache item.
The data to insert into the cache.
Optional. The number of minutes to keep an item in the cache. The default is 20.

Optional. true to indicate that the cache item expiration is reset each time the item is accessed, or false to indicate that the expiration is based the absolute time since the item was added to the cache. The default is true. In that case, if you also use the default value for the parameter, a cached item expires 20 minutes after it was last accessed.
Docs.summary: Inserts an item into the object.
Docs.exception: Sliding expiration is enabled and the value of is greater than a year.
